thread.title: Sudan: Sudanese Revolutionary Front (SRF) rebels declare six-month unilateral cessation of hostilities | War and Conflict
thread.title_full: Sudan: Sudanese Revolutionary Front (SRF) rebels declare six-month unilateral cessation of hostilities | War and Conflict

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Sudan: Sudanese Revolutionary Front (SRF) rebels declare six-month unilateral cessation of hostilities | War and Conflict
text:
(Before It's News)
The Sudanese Revolutionary Front (SRF) declared a six-month cessation of hostilities and expressed readiness to negotiate the details of this truce with the government ahead of peace talks.
The unilateral decision was endorsed during a meeting of the SRF groups in Paris from 13-17 October. But it was officially released on Sunday as the discussions were dominated by the controversial transfer of chairmanship.
[Read Moreâ€¦]
